Description: Fragment from a relief plaque; ivory; depicting in low relief the head, chest and forelegs of a horse, moving to left.
Bibliographic references: Petrie at al 1915 / Heliopolis, Kafr Ammar and Shurafa (p. 43, pl. L.5 (righ half))
Acquisition name: Donated by: British School of Archaeology, Egypt
Acquisition notes: Register says found c.6 miles south of Helouan.
